summary:
I am a results-driven qualified Chartered Accountant & MBA with a decade worth of work experience in all phases of audit (Big 4) and industry/commerce experience in corporate finance as a Financial Controller.

Audit: I have benefitted from Big 4 training both in Europe and Zimbabwe. The experienced gained during this period was based on leading Audits with turnovers up to US$30 Billion, across a variety of clients within the following industries: Manufacturing, Banking & Finance, Motor/Automotive, FMCG, Pension funds and Non-governmental industries. I have experience with IFRS, US GAAP and Dutch GAAP standards. I was renowned for my ability to coach and train juniors alongside delivering on tight deadlines and budgets. A key component of providing quality service was growing in strong, clear communication skills, therefore, ensuring that I deliver concise and transparent audit findings in a manner that both clients and colleagues understand and appreciate to ensure the consistent provision of value-adding, top quality client service.

Commerce: I developed further experience by changing my career path from the audit/accounting firm industry to corporate finance and working with finance and other professionals all around the world. I have been responsible for the accounting, reporting, consolidation, financial statements, taxation, audit, regulatory reporting and finance projects.


Key Clients:
CBZ Holdings (largest bank in Zimbabwe)
Delta Corporation (largest company by market capitalization in Zimbabwe)
First National Bank (largest company by market capitalization in Botswana)
General Electric financial services (Netherlands. Spain, Germany, Belgium and France)
Pfizer
